lines.text: There once was a beautiful princess who's father, the king, went off to fight in a foreign war
When does the young knight come?
And it better hold him for the next ten days
We can always sneak out to a motel, can we?

The king had placed his daughter in a tower room where there were no windows and no doors, she was left there for a long... slow... slower time. Many years past and she began to forget what the king looked like and all she could do was dream...
